name: dashboard
description: A dashboard to view repo-automation-bot metrics

scripts.build-client-only: cd ./client && npm run build && cd .. && npm run copy-client-build
scripts.build: npm run build-server-only && npm run build-client-only
scripts.local-docker: npm run compile && npm run docker-build-local && npm run docker-start-local
scripts.deploy: npm run compile && gcloud config set project repo-automation-bots && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/repo-automation-bots/dashboard && gcloud run deploy --image gcr.io/repo-automation-bots/dashboard --platform managed

author: asonawalla@google.com
